title: HOUR 3-Randy Edsall and Notah Begay III 080620
itunes:title: HOUR 3-Randy Edsall and Notah Begay III 080620
description:
Randy Edsall joins Dan Patrick to defend the decision to opt out of the 2020 football season. He says money is the only reason to play this season and that’s not worth risking the health of the student athletes. Notah Begay III tells Dan how they made Tiger Woods carry all the bags during his freshman year at Stanford. Notah says he would always rather play in 100 degree weather 100 out of 100 times over cold weather.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Randy Edsall joins Dan Patrick to defend the decision to opt out of the 2020 football season. He says money is the only reason to play this season and that’s not worth risking the health of the student athletes. Notah Begay III tells Dan how they made Tiger Woods carry all the bags during his freshman year at Stanford. Notah says he would always rather play in 100 degree weather 100 out of 100 times over cold weather.
